comments:
I get the excception below whenever I try and right click on something in the
Graph view of the wsdl editor when diting types in the schema part. So I cannot
now use any menu items within that types / schema editing part. This used to
work last week and I have not changed my eclipse config.

It is accompanied by a "Unhandled event loop exception" too.

The exception:

Rich, this sounds like some evil casting going on here.  Please investigate.

This seems to be fixed now in WTP 1.5 RC5.  Thanks for reporting!  Please open
if req'd

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP defects already verified by the reporter but awaiting closure by the assignee.  If you feel this defect was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
